allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Remove build artifacts from git and update .gitignore

- Added .NET build artifacts (bin/, obj/, *.dll, *.exe, etc.) to .gitignore
- Removed all tracked build artifacts from repository
- Updated README.md with latest changes

This prevents build artifacts from being committed and fixes git permission issues with running executables.
